tier.item: b. mas fizo gelo otorgar el santo Obispo con la sandalia quel dio.
but made.3Sg him-it admit the saint Bishop with the sandal that-him gave.3Sg
& fizo el papa penitencia & dixo sant Antidio la missa en su logar & consagro
& made the pope penance & said saint Antidio the mass in his place & consecrated
la crisma & tomo unapartida della pora si. & espidiosse del papa & salio fuera
the host & took a piece of-it for self & took leave from-the pope & went out
& caualgo enel diablo & llego a su Obispado
& rodeon-the devil & arrived to his Bishopric
but the Bishop made him admit it by presenting him with the sandal. And the pope
did penance and Saint Antidio said the mass for him and consecrated the host and
took a piece for himself. Then said farewell to the pope, went out and rode the devil,
and arrived to his bishophric.' (EE-I.126r)
